title: Deputy Prime Minister Ishaq Dar, Sardar Ayaz Sadiq arrive Quetta
content:
QUETTA, Aug 13 (APP):Deputy Prime Minister and Foreign Minister Muhammad Ishaq Dar and Speaker National Assembly Sardar Ayaz Sadiq on Tuesday arrived in Quetta to attend the celebrations of the Independence Day.
Deputy Prime Minister Muhammad Ishaq Dar, Speaker National Assembly Sardar Ayaz Sadiq and Federal Minister for Commerce Jam Kamal received by Balochistan Governor Jaffar Khan Mandukhail, Chief Minister Mir Sarfaraz Bugti, Speaker Balochistan Assembly Abdul Khaliq Achakzai, Member National Assembly Jamal Shah Kakar. Provincial Ministers Bakht Muhammad Kakar, Raheela Hameed Durrani and Haji Ali MadadÂ  Jatak at Quetta Airport.
The Deputy Prime Minister will participate in the celebrations of August 14 in Quetta and meet with the Governor, Chief Minister, the leaders and members of Parliament of Muslim League-N Balochistan during his visit of Quetta.
